author: yegor
msg: 1. included ooxml javadocs in build.xml2. added a new rich example: BusinessPlan.java3. misc bug fixes

author: gsim
msg: SubscriptionManager and Dispatcher were missing wait() methods meaning that if start was called there was no way to join with the dispatch thread and shutdown cleanly. Fixed by adding that method.

author: ieb
msg: Modified the schema to remove strict sequencing of elements within people and various other areas. This was clearly
going to be unworkable for most serialization strategies.
Now the elements of person, and other elements where there are implicit collections listed by a sequence of tags (eg person.organisations)

author: mturk
msg: Bump trunk version to 1.2.0 and make APR 1.3.3+ dependent
